Name: Roselyn Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A 2:1 Wet Martini tamed by a dash of pomegranate/grenadine syrup.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Roselyn Cocktail contains 190 calories
